CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Q_NbPONPortsKnown__c, 'Yes'),Q_PONPorts_WithoutTypeB__c,CEILING((IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-010S-P'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_9__c,0)+IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-040P-Q'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_12__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-240G-C'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_2__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-240W-B'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_5__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-080P-P'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_1__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-240W-A'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_3__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-241W-A'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_4__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-010G-A'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_6__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-440G-A'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_7__c,0) +IF( INCLUDES(Q_ONTType_1_to_12__c, 'G-240G-A'),Q_ONTQty_1_to_8__c,0))/Q_SplitRatio__c))
CustomField.label: C_TotalGPONPorts_BP_For
